resources.string: We’re sorry, we encountered a problem while connecting to Flexa. You can submit a report to help us fix the problem, or simply try again later.

Thank you for taking the time to submit this report to Flexa. We’re sorry that this problem happened, and we really appreciate your help.

Please describe, with as much detail as possible, what you were doing before you ran into this problem:



————————————————————
Please do not edit or delete these details, which will help us with our investigation:
Instantly spend your %1$s balances anywhere Flexa is accepted.
Flexa was built from the ground up to keep your personal data private.
Flexa uses your email address to sign you in and send you receipts for your payments. Your email address is never shared with %1$s or any other business.

The 6-digit verification code is displayed after you approve the sign-in request that was sent to your email address. If you don’t remember seeing a code, try opening your verification email again on this device.
Please provide a few details to start making payments with Flexa.
Just one more step. Check your inbox and tap the link we sent you to verify your email address.
The information you provide is used only to comply with local financial regulations, and will never be shared with %1$s or any of the businesses you pay. By creating an account, you agree to Flexa’s
Enter the email address associated with your Flexa ID to continue:
By continuing, you confirm that these details are correct and agree to Flexa’s
Enter the details below to create your Flexa ID for spending:
Enter the state, province, or territory of your current legal residence.
To finish creating your Flexa ID, click the link we just sent to
, or enter your secret code below:
To finish connecting your Flexa ID, click the link we just sent to
You must be 13 years of age or older to use Flexa.
To protect your privacy, any data you previously provided has been permanently deleted.
An important note for our Hawaii customers

Flexa Network Inc. (“Flexa”) is providing services to you as a participant in a special Hawaii project which ends on December 31, 2022. At the end of the project term, Flexa may be required to close all accounts for Hawaii customers and cease operations. Flexa will notify Hawaii customers in advance if accounts must be closed.\n\nHawaii customers who choose to open accounts with Flexa are advised that the virtual currency or digital currency purchased, whether as an investment, for making payments, or other purposes, may lose value, including the loss of some or all of your original purchase amount.
Are you sure you want to disconnect your Flexa ID?
Pay with Flexa is not available in your region.
Federal law prevents Flexa from making its services available in some regions. For more information, please contact Flexa support.
